titleStmt.title: A memento for the people about their elections of members for the approaching Parliament.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Rich. Moone, at the Seven Stars in Paul's Church-yard, neer the great North-door,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
